perturbation.original_text: Affiliates means subsidiaries or other entities that will be mutually agreed in writing.
perturbation.changed_text: Affiliates means subsidiaries or other entities that may or may not be mutually agreed in writing, at the sole discretion of W2E.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces uncertainty by making the agreement on affiliates discretionary for W2E. The original text implies a mutual agreement, while the modified text allows W2E to unilaterally decide on affiliates, creating a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text:
Term has the meaning set out in Clause 3.1;

     3.1 This Agreement shall commence on the Commencement Date and shall continue for a term of ten (10) years, unless previously terminated in  accordance with Clause 15 (Termination).
perturbation.changed_text:
Term has the meaning set out in Clause 3.1;

     3.1 This Agreement shall commence on the Commencement Date and the term will be determined by mutual agreement of both parties and may be subjected to certain conditions.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that the agreement term is for ten (10) years. The modified text removes the certainty by introducing mutual agreement making it unclear the period, and subject to change depending on the circumstances. This contradiction leads to dispute.

perturbation.original_text: Territory shall mean the world with the exception of the following countries which are expressly reserved by W2E: Spain, Italy and  Canada.
perturbation.changed_text: Territory shall mean the world. The countries expressly reserved by W2E (Spain, Italy and Canada) will be subjected to review by SHBV upon request.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly excluded Spain, Italy and Canada. The modified text makes it that it will be up to SHBV to request to have the excluded countries to be part of the territory, making it uncertain as to whether it is really excluded or can be included.
